Welcome on the Mipadd, the first free market of paddy rice in Europe.
The aim of Mipadd is to put in direct relations rice growers / sellers and a range of buyers (industrials), French and European, for the sale of paddy rice.
It is typically a website of brokerage online, which allows to deposit quantities of paddy rice at a duration and price determined, in order to propose the buyers, who regularly come to visit the website.
Mipadd is neutral and allows the conclusion of contracts in perfect transparency : a quantity, a price, a place, a duration for the offer.
Mipadd is not a party in the contract, it is a way to confirm the agreement between the Seller and the Buyer, and to follow its execution in good order.
